dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2535 IH: FEMA Temporary Housing Assistance Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley (for herself and Ms. Chu) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to prohibit the President from considering insurance as a duplication of benefits for certain assistance under such Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the FEMA Temporary Housing Assistance Improvement Act.
Section 408(c)(1) of the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act (42 U.S.C. 5174(c)(1)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: In determining eligibility for temporary housing assistance under this subsection, the President may not consider insurance a duplication of benefits for the purpose of applying section 312 of this Act.
